alert.note: Alert for Cass; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:35AM EST until March 06 at 11:49AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Salamonie River below Warren affecting Huntington, Wells, Jay, Wabash and Blackford Counties. Tippecanoe River above Winamac affecting Carroll, Pulaski and White Counties. Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Wells and Adams Counties. Eel River at North Manchester affecting Miami, Cass IN, Kosciusko, Wabash and Whitley Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Indiana... Tippecanoe River near Ora affecting Marshall, Pulaski, Fulton IN, Kosciusko and Starke Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eel River at North Manchester. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood waters approach businesses and homes on South Mill Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 12.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
